title: Exquisite Pink Bloom Jhumka - A Delicate Dance of Tradition and Modernity
materials: featuring sparkling Diamond accents and delicate Rice Pearls (Moti). The centerpiece is a stunning Pink Gemstone. Features a brilliant cut.
features: This contemporary Jhumka features a floral bloom at the top, intricately set with diamonds. A graceful cascade of diamond-studded leaves and flowers descends, culminating in a cluster of lustrous Rice Pearls. The design blends floral motifs with modern sensibilities.
colors: The piece boasts a harmonious color scheme with the warmth of 18 KT Gold
the soft blush of the Pink Gemstone
and the gentle shimmer of Rice Pearls.
occasions: from a modern reception to a traditional Sangeet. This piece will enhance your natural beauty and leave a lasting impression.
description: These earrings are a unique fusion of traditional and modern aesthetics, making them a versatile addition to your jewelry collection. The exquisite craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure both beauty and durability. The delicate floral design with its captivating pearls adds a touch of elegance, perfect for any special occasion.
